list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a person) deal effectively with something difficult.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: his ability to cope with stress
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: khả năng của anh ấy để đối phó với căng thẳng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (in building) cover (a joint or structure) with a coping.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a high wall coped with tiles
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Một bức tường cao được đối phó với gạch

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a long, loose cloak worn by a priest or bishop on ceremonial occasions.
